title: Postal.DVDRip.Ger-LGLuX.mp4
description:
Movie:     Postal
Director:  Uwe Boll
Starring:  Zack Ward , Ralph Moeller
Codec:     H.264
Audio:     German , English (commentary)
Size:      Approx 890MB
IMDB:     <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0486640/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0486640/</a>



Ok ppl we really tried everything to finally get you an english version , seems to be an impossible task at the moment , so for the first time we deliver 2 audio tracks , the german dub (wich you can find basically everywhere) and the english directors commentary. About the commentary , Uwe doesent talk all the time , he shuts up pretty often because of his bad english accent , the original english audio track is audible all the time troughout the movie it just gets leveled down when he talks , so basically if you dont want to get subtitles or sumthing you can watch the movie with commentary and mostly get the english track so you get most of the jokes and can follow the main story line.


Enjoy


LGLuX
